skillTree.name: Favoured Son
skillTree.description: Slaanesh's favoured child has been granted the gift of preternatural swordsmanship.

skillTree.name: Marked by Slaanesh
skillTree.description: The beatific Mark of Slaanesh is branded into Sigvald's perfect body.

effects.description:
Weapon strength +15% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hearts of Iron
skillTree.description: The followers of Chaos need not to rest, they march on with iron hearts desperate to harvest souls.

skillTree.name: Voice of the Dark Gods
skillTree.description: This Lord speaks with a dread booming voice - a gift from his Dark Masters to ensure obedience.

skillTree.name: Aura of Chaos
skillTree.description: The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.

skillTree.name: Strike First!
skillTree.description: The Son of Slaanesh always strikes first and never looks back.

skillTree.name: Sovereign of the North
skillTree.description: Tribes bow before Sigvald the Magnificent.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +10% for Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +10 for Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Egomaniacal
skillTree.description: Being unable to contemplate anything other than their own perverse needs and desires would be a handicap for anyone else, but not so Sigvald the Magnificent.

effects.description:
Campaign movement range: +10% for armies
	(local armies)

Upkeep: 0% for Chaos Lord and Chaos Sorcerer Lord
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.name: Self-Obsessed
skillTree.description: "I know, I know - I truly am a perfect specimen. Hold the mirror a bit higher… higher! Yes that's right…"

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: +10%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Stylish
skillTree.description: "What think you of this particular suit of armour? I think the gold really captures my best aspects - all of them hahahaha!"

skillTree.name: Driven by Lust
skillTree.description: Sigvald inspires fanatical devotion in his followers, for they know that in the aftermath of battle they may sate their most unholy lusts without restraint.

skillTree.name: Born to Serve
skillTree.description: Sigvald's sycophantic minions will do anything to stay in his favour, not realising that he cares for none but himself and the attention of the Dark Prince, Slaanesh.

skillTree.name: Unworthy
skillTree.description: On sight of Sigvald's undeniable magnificence the enemy must confront their own obvious inadequacies, and despair.

effects.description:
Unit capacity: +2
	Guardians of Dark Prince Desires

skillTree.name: Mirror
skillTree.description: Drown in my beauty!

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Perfect Son
skillTree.description: Soon they shall swoon, shall seek solace and death from sundry torments wrought on them by my strategic, severing, scintillating shower of shimmering strikes!

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unbreakable Will
skillTree.description: Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald - the salacious, scandalous and sensational servant of Slaanesh!

effects.description:
Number of uses: +1 for Daemonettes of Slaanesh summon in battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Not Today
skillTree.description: See how I stroll, stride, swagger and swirl, spin, slash and stab at stupid, senseless scum!

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Passion, Love and Decadence
skillTree.description: Every breath is an opportunity to take in a new scent. Each glass raised is a chance to savour a new flavour. On every battlefield, each sword blow can entice a never before heard pain-filled scream.

skillTree.name: Eye of the Gods
skillTree.description: The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Dominating Presence
skillTree.description: A Chaos Lord dominates – lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

skillTree.name: Chaos Vanguard
skillTree.description: To the Northmen, there is no greater honour than to fight and perish under the gaze of the Gods.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack and leadership: +1 for Chaos Cultists units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Chaos Marauders, Aspiring Champions, and Forsaken units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack and leadership: +4 for Chaos Cultists units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Savage Bloodlust
skillTree.description: Khorne’s will imbues his creatures with a vicious, unslakeable hunger for battle.

	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +20 for Marauder Horsemen, Marauder Horsemaster, Chaos Warhounds, and Chaos Feral Manticore units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blessed by Chaos
skillTree.description: Unnatural strength, an aura of dark menace, an unwavering devotion to the Chaos Gods – some warriors have undoubtedly been touched by the Ruinous Ones.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +1 for Khorne Berzerkers and Bloodletters of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +5% for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Chaos Warriors, Chaos Spawn, and Chosen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Khorne Berzerkers and Bloodletters of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hammer into Anvil
skillTree.description: Breaking bones and ending lives, the armies of Chaos strike like an unholy hammer crashing through their enemies' ranks.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +5 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength +3% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Dragon Ogres, Chaos Knights, Gorebeast Chariot, and Chaos Chariot units

	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength +12% for Guardians of Dark Prince Desires and Daemonettes of Slaanesh units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monstrous Strength
skillTree.description: Hulks of pure muscle, held upright by unsullied hatred, can crush a man with a frightening lack of effort.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +2 for Dragon Ogre Shaggoth, Chaos Trolls, Great Chaos Dragon and Chaos Giant units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Doomfire
skillTree.description: Doomfire is a gift from Khorne, to ensure the Hellcannons speak with extra fury.

Leadership: +1 for Zealots of Change units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +3% for Pink Horrors of Tzeentch units

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Legion of Doom
skillTree.description: The legions march forth under the Lord's inscrutable gaze, eager to kill for fear of his wrath.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Magic resistance: 15% for Chaos Marauders, Chaos Warriors, Forsaken, Aspiring Champions, and Chosen units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Speed & Malice
skillTree.description: The worthiest of Chaos' vanguard are blessed with the most elaborate mutations, which also enable them to run faster for longer.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: 15% for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +15 for Chaos Warhounds, Chaos Chariot, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Knights, Dragon Ogres, and Chaos Feral Manticore units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Freakish Mutations
skillTree.description: Mutations awarded by the Chaos Gods to their followers may look horrific to southerners, but such gifts are prized.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: 10% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Trolls, Chaos Spawn, Great Chaos Dragon, Chaos Giant and Dragon Ogre Shaggoth units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Guided by Tzeentch
skillTree.description: Impossible foresight is granted to a few among the ranks of the Ruinous armies, allowing them to land the critical blow upon their foes.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +10% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +15% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen, and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +10% for Hellcannon, Marauder Horsemen and Marauder Horsemasters units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +25
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -5% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -10% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

Recruitment cost: -20% for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Tribes of Chaos
skillTree.description: A Lord that was once part of the tribes - one who rode the great Norscan migrations - can summon his kin.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -3% for Chaos Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -6% for Chaos Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Chaos Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ruination
skillTree.description: "This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +20% when laying siege
	(local region)

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for Lords
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Dark Apothecary
skillTree.description: The Dark Apothecaries mix their fell unguents, ensuring those that can continue to serve.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Gathering of Might
skillTree.description: The masses flock to the Lord of Chaos - a dread time will soon fall on the weaklings in the south.

skillTree.name: Premonition
skillTree.description: This being must be touched by Tzeentch, seeing things before they happen.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +8%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +15%

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption - as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

Recruitment cost: -8% for all units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep and recruitment cost: -25% for Chaos Cultists units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Supreme Vanity
backgroundSkills.description: "Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -25% for Chaos Marauder units
	(Lord's army)

Mirror Guard serve Sigvald for free
	(Lord's army)

ui_effects.description: Units won't regenerate if cap was reached
